description: This bright and spacious three-bedroom, two-bathroom townhome offers the perfect blend of comfort, style, and functionality across three well-designed levels. Soaring vaulted ceilings and abundant natural light create an airy, welcoming atmosphere throughout the home. Set at the back of a quiet, well-landscaped complex surrounded by mature trees, this thoughtfully maintained residence provides plenty of room for both relaxing and entertaining. Enjoy the convenience of a brand-new hot water tank, in-suite laundry, a parking space located directly in front of the unit for easy access, and a sunny backyard patio. Additional highlights include a cozy gas fireplace (with gas included in the strata fees!), generous storage space, dedicated bike storage, and a well-managed, pet-friendly complex with ample visitor parking. This move-in-ready home is ideal for families, professionals, or anyone seeking a bright and comfortable townhome close to all of Victoriaâ€™s amenities.
